review: Awesome, but one for each TV in the house.  Great interface, plenty of streaming options, easy controls.
author: SB619

review: Not what I expected.  Settings are not clear.  More instructions are needed.  I can get better access via my blu Ray player.
author: Dorothy M. Reina

review: Chromecast is a pretty good product for streaming music and movies to your television. It isn't perfect, but you can't beat the price. I wish more apps were capable of synchronizing. One of my favorite options is streaming an entire webpage from your computer using Google Chrome.
author: Alison

review: I have had trouble viewing YouTube and video's from other sources, and sometime the cast picture is at a different speed than the device it is cast from.Maybe its me and I was expecting more than the device is capable of delivering...Still having problems, really should have sent it back but lost the packing material..
author: Anthony555 "Anthony k.Nance"

review: I will use this all year round... Love it...
author: barmorec

review: Awesome. Now we can chill and watch TV instead of straining to both view the desk top at the same time.
author: Poozy

review: The device itself is fine as are the installation instructions.  However, the instructions for casting from various devices is poor.  I had to view a few YouTube videos before getting it to work fully.
author: Richard R. Pardi

review: Didn't realize it's not really compatible with apple devices and seems to stream clearer from my laptop when I just use a regular hdmi cord. Wouldn't say I'm disappointed, just waste of money for me.
author: Janae Bradshaw
